name: test-yarn2
description: Tests for dictionaries included by a Yarn 2 repository

scripts.prepare-cspell-action: npm run prepare-yarn2 && npm run prepare-yarn3
scripts.prepare-yarn2: npm run prepare-yarn2-med && npm run prepare-yarn2-sci
scripts.prepare-yarn3: npm run prepare-yarn3-med && npm run prepare-yarn3-sci
scripts.test: npm run test-yarn2 && npm run test-yarn3
scripts.test-yarn2: npm run test-yarn2-med && npm run test-yarn2-sci
scripts.test-yarn3: npm run test-yarn3-med && npm run test-yarn3-sci
